mutants.original_line: while l1 or l2 or carry:
mutants.mutated_line: while l1 and l2 and carry:

mutants.original_line: sum = (l1.val if l1 else 0) + (l2.val if l2 else 0) + carry
mutants.mutated_line: sum = (l1.val if l1 else 0) + (l2.val if l2 else 0) - carry

mutants.original_line: sum = (l1.val if l1 else 0) + (l2.val if l2 else 0) + carry
mutants.mutated_line: sum = ((l1.val if l1 else 0) + (l2.val if l2 else 0)) * carry

mutants.original_line: sum = (l1.val if l1 else 0) + (l2.val if l2 else 0) + carry
mutants.mutated_line: sum = (l1.val if l1 else 0) - (l2.val if l2 else 0) + carry

mutants.original_line: sum = (l1.val if l1 else 0) + (l2.val if l2 else 0) + carry
mutants.mutated_line: sum = (l1.val if l1 else 0) * (l2.val if l2 else 0) + carry

mutants.original_line: sum = (l1.val if l1 else 0) + (l2.val if l2 else 0) + carry
mutants.mutated_line: sum = (l1.val if l1 else 1) + (l2.val if l2 else 0) + carry

mutants.original_line: sum = (l1.val if l1 else 0) + (l2.val if l2 else 0) + carry
mutants.mutated_line: sum = (l1.val if l1 else -1) + (l2.val if l2 else 0) + carry

mutants.original_line: sum = (l1.val if l1 else 0) + (l2.val if l2 else 0) + carry
mutants.mutated_line: sum = (l1.val if l1 else 1) + (l2.val if l2 else 0) + carry

mutants.original_line: sum = (l1.val if l1 else 0) + (l2.val if l2 else 0) + carry
mutants.mutated_line: sum = (l1.val if l1 else 0) + (l2.val if l2 else 1) + carry

mutants.original_line: sum = (l1.val if l1 else 0) + (l2.val if l2 else 0) + carry
mutants.mutated_line: sum = (l1.val if l1 else 0) + (l2.val if l2 else -1) + carry

mutants.original_line: sum = (l1.val if l1 else 0) + (l2.val if l2 else 0) + carry
mutants.mutated_line: sum = (l1.val if l1 else 0) + (l2.val if l2 else 1) + carry
